casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lewis E. PERSON 267P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2017 Lewis E. Person, for Person, Lewis E. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of August 2017 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2017."
